TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextCompositionManager extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public NotInheritable Class TextCompositionManager Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: 提供與輸入和文字撰寫相關之事件的管理功能。

span.span: Provides facilities for managing events related to input and text compositions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool CompleteComposition(class System.Windows.Input.TextComposition composition) cil managed
Public Shared Function CompleteComposition (composition As TextComposition) As Boolean

param.name: composition
param.span: 要完成的 物件。

span.span: A object to complete.

summary.span: 可完成指定的文字撰寫。

span.span: Completes a specified text composition.

returns.span: 如果已成功完成文字撰寫則為 **true**，否則為 **false**。

span.span: **true** if the text composition was successfully completed; otherwise, **false**.
Raised when *composition* is **null**.

exception.span: 當沒有與 *composition* 相關聯的輸入管理員，或者已經將文字撰寫標記為完成時引發。

span.span: Raised when there is no input manager associated with *composition*, or when the text composition is already marked as completed.

summary.span: 當完成 時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a is completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是此事件的通道版本。This is the tunneling version of this event. 事件反昇版本，請參閱。For the bubbling version, see . 這是附加的事件由欄位。This is an attached event identified by the field. 使用和方法來管理指定相依性物件上的此事件。Use the and methods to manage this event on a specified dependency object.
